TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ButtonColumn extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 包含用户定义按钮的 控件的列类型。

span.span: A column type for the control that contains a user-defined button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类控件中的每一行创建对应的按钮控件。Use the class in a control to create a button that corresponds with each row in the control. 指定通过设置显示在按钮中的标题属性。Specify the caption that is displayed in the buttons by setting the property. 如果你设置属性、 中的所有按钮对象共享相同的标题。If you set the property, all buttons in the object share the same caption. 或者，你可以将绑定按钮添加到数据源中的字段。Alternatively, you can bind the buttons to a field in a data source. 这使你可以显示不同的每个按钮的标题。This allows you to display different captions for each button. 指定字段中的值用于文本标题。The values in the specified field are used for the text caption. 设置属性将绑定给数据源中的字段。Set the property to bind the to a field in a data source. 您可以设置格式通过设置显示在按钮中的标题使用格式设置字符串的属性。You can format the captions that are displayed in the buttons by setting the property with a formatting string. 单击中的按钮引发事件。Clicking the buttons in the raises the event. 你可以以编程方式控制时通过提供的事件处理程序中单击该按钮时执行的操作事件。You can programmatically control the action that is performed when the button is clicked by providing an event handler for the event. 默认情况下，页不验证中的按钮时单击。By default, page validation is not performed when a button in the is clicked. 页验证确定与验证关联的输入的控件是否控件在页上通过了所有验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control. 若要执行页验证在单击按钮时，设置属性`true`。To perform page validation when a button is clicked, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类控件创建**添加**按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use class in a control to create **Add** buttons. [!code-csharp[ButtonColumnButtonType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonColumnButtonType/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ButtonColumnButtonType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonColumnButtonType/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 对象中显示的按钮的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of button to display in the object.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否在按钮对象显示为链接或下压按钮。Use the property to specify whether the buttons in the object are displayed as link or push buttons. 下表列出可能的设置。The following table lists the possible settings. |按钮类型Button type|显示Display| |-----------------|-------------| ||链接。A link.| ||按钮控件。A button control.| 单击中的按钮引发事件。Clicking the buttons in the raises the event. 你可以以编程方式控制时通过提供的事件处理程序中单击该按钮时执行的操作事件。You can programmatically control the action that is performed when the button is clicked by providing an event handler for the event. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定中的按钮对象显示为下压按钮。The following code example demonstrates how use the property to specify that the buttons in the object are displayed as push buttons. [!code-csharp[ButtonColumnButtonType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonColumnButtonType/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ButtonColumnButtonType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonColumnButtonType/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的列类型不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified column type is not one of the values.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 对象中的按钮时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when a button in the object is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 中的按钮时执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when a button in the is clicked; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，页不验证中的按钮时单击对象。By default, page validation is not performed when a button in the object is clicked. 页验证确定与验证关联的输入的控件是否控件在页上通过了所有验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control. 若要执行页验证中的按钮时单击后，设置属性`true`。To perform page validation when a button in the is clicked, set the property to `true`. 时的值属性是`true`，你还可以使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称将导致验证。When the value of the property is `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the causes validation. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串表示当单击 对象中的按钮时要执行的命令。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that represents the command to perform when a button in the object is clicked.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示当单击 中的按钮时要执行的命令。

span.span: A string that represents the command to perform when a button in the is clicked.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用相关联的命令名称，如属性`Add`或`Remove`，与按钮。Use the property to associate a command name, such as `Add` or `Remove`, with a button. 你可以设置属性设置为任何字符串，标识要执行中的按钮时的操作单击对象。You can set the property to any string that identifies the action to perform when a button in the object is clicked. 然后，你可以以编程方式确定的事件处理程序中的命令名称事件并执行相应的操作。Then, you can determine programmatically the command name in the event handler for the event and perform the appropriate actions. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用与按钮相关联的命令名称属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to associate a command name with a button. 然后，单击按钮的命令名称在事件处理程序中以编程方式确定事件和相应的操作执行。Then, the command name of the clicked button is determined programmatically in the event handler for the event and the appropriate action is performed. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonColumnCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonColumnCommandName/CS/ButtonColumnCommandNameCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonColumnCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonColumnCommandName/VB/ButtonColumnCommandNameVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要绑定到 对象的数据源的字段名。

span.span: Gets or sets the field name from a data source to bind to the object.

value.span: 要绑定到 的字段名。

span.span: The field name to bind to the .
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要绑定到数据源的字段名称属性中的按钮对象。Use the property to specify the field name from the data source to bind to the property of the buttons in the object. 将列绑定到的字段而不是直接设置属性使你可以显示不同的标题中的按钮通过指定字段中使用的值。Binding the column to a field instead of directly setting the property allows you to display different captions for the buttons in the by using the values in the specified field. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将绑定给数据源中的字段的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to bind the object to a field in a data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonColumnDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonColumnDataTextField/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonColumnDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonColumnDataTextField/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置字符串，该字符串指定各按钮中标题的显示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the caption in each button.

value.span: 指定各按钮中标题的显示格式的字符串。

span.span: The string that specifies the display format for the caption in each button.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性中的按钮的标题提供的自定义显示格式对象。Use the property to provide a custom display format for the caption of the buttons in the object. 数据格式字符串包含的形式，以冒号分隔的两个部分`{A:Bxx}`。The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form `{A:Bxx}`. 例如，在格式设置字符串`{0:F2}`设置要显示的定点数与两位小数的单元格的格式。For example, the formatting string `{0:F2}` formats the cell to display a fixed point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 整个字符串必须括在大括号以指示它是一个格式字符串而不是文本字符串。The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string. 大括号外的任何文本显示为文字文本。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 冒号前的值 (`A`常规示例中) 从零开始的参数列表中，指定的参数索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 因为在每个单元格只有一个值，此值可以设置只为 0。This value can be set only to 0 because there is only one value in each cell. 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定要显示中的值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format to display the value in. 下表列出了常见的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|显示数字值在Displays numeric values in| |----------------------|--------------------------------| |`C`|货币格式。Currency format.| |`D`|十进制格式。Decimal format.| |`E`|科学记数 （指数） 格式。Scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定的格式。Fixed format.| |`G`|常规格式。General format.| |`N`|数值格式。Number format.| |`X`|十六进制格式。Hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，除`X`，它会显示在指定的大小写的十六进制字符。The format character is not case sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字符后的值 (`xx`常规示例中) 指定的有效位数或小数位数显示数量。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性显示在每个按钮的标题以货币格式的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the caption of each button in the object in currency format. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonColumnDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonColumnDataTextField/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonColumnDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonColumnDataTextField/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在 对象的按钮中显示的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the caption that is displayed in the buttons of the object.

value.span: 在 的按钮中显示的标题。

span.span: The caption displayed in the buttons of the .
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定或确定显示在按钮中的标题对象。Use the property to specify or determine the caption that is displayed in the buttons of the object. > [!NOTE] > 如果你设置属性、 中的所有按钮共享相同的标题。If you set the property, all buttons in the share the same caption. 或者，你可以将绑定给数据源中的字段。Alternatively, you can bind the to a field in a data source. 这使你可以在使用中的指定字段的值的列中显示不同的按钮的标题。This allows you to display different captions for the buttons in the column using the values in the specified field. 设置属性将绑定给数据源中的字段。Set the property to bind the to a field in a data source. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的标题中的按钮对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption for the buttons in the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ButtonColumn.ButtonType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ButtonColumn.ButtonType Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ButtonColumn.ButtonType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ButtonColumn.ButtonType Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象在回发到服务器时导致验证的验证控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of validation controls for which the object causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 对象回发到服务器时导致验证的验证控件组。

span.span: The group of validation controls for which the object causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组都可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称对象回发到服务器时要进行验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the object causes validation when it posts back to the server. 属性才起作用时，才的值属性设置为`true`。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 当指定的值属性，只会验证控件且是指定组的一部分时验证回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the posts back to the server. 如果未指定的值属性和属性设置为`true`，在页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件进行都验证时回发到服务器。If you do not specify a value for the property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the posts back to the server. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.
